tool_description: Calculates the relationship between player engagement metrics and revenue generation, identifying high-value engagement patterns and monetization opportunities.

analysis_period.description: Days to analyze for revenue impact

error_messages: Empty engagement data: Player engagement data required for revenue impact analysis.
Empty monetization events: Revenue data required to calculate impact correlations.
Invalid analysis period: Must be between 7 and 365 days.
Data mismatch: Engagement and revenue data must cover overlapping time periods.
usage: Provide engagement_data from engagement analysis and monetization_events data. Set analysis_period as needed. Returns revenue correlations, high-value segments, and monetization insights.

revenue_correlation.description: Correlation coefficient between engagement and revenue

high_value_segments.description: Player segments with highest revenue potential

monetization_insights.description: Key insights about revenue optimization opportunities

ltv_predictions.description: Lifetime value predictions based on engagement patterns
